EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Reminder - Feb15 Mobility
EmailTemplate.subject: Intapp Mobile Strategy Webinar Starting in 30 Minutes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for registering for the Intapp "Developing a Mobile Strategy" webinar. It will start in 30 minutes, at 9:00am Pacific / 12:00pm Eastern / 5:00pm GMT.
To join the webinar:
URL: https://intappinc.webex.com/intappinc/onstage/g.php?MTID=ef08626b05dfe609e896d84a7d0e5182d
The audio will automatically stream through your computer speakers. If you prefer to access the audio through your telephone, dial-in instructions will be available once you're in the WebEx.
If you have any technical difficulties joining the webinar, please send me an email.
Regards,
Lea Schweitzer Marketing Manager Intapp - Software for a Changing Legal Market
